data.eml:eml: Comments on the genus Zalarnaca Gorochov, 2005 (Orthoptera: Gryllacrididae: Gryllacridinae) with two new combinations and two new synonyms

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Fuming, Du, Baojie, Bian, Xun (2017): Comments on the genus Zalarnaca Gorochov, 2005 (Orthoptera: Gryllacrididae: Gryllacridinae) with two new combinations and two new synonyms. Zootaxa 4216 (5): 482-486, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.242366
